reason: Conflicting signals with strong ETF inflows potentially reversing, ongoing miner capitulation suggesting a bottoming process but also continued selling pressure. Concurrently, significant underlying market fragility from widespread hacks, extreme volatility (flash crash to $0), and increased regulatory scrutiny due to illicit activities, indicate a highly volatile and risky accumulation phase.
headlines: Bitcoin, ether, solana and XRP extend ETF inflow streak before reversal
Crypto’s worst year for hacks wasn’t a smart contract problem. It was a people problem.
Bitcoin hashrate drops 15% from October high as miner capitulation drags into almost 60 days
Bitcoin price briefly plunges to $0 on lesser-known Paradex exchange
Chinese crime ring arrested in South Korea laundered over $100 million worth of crypto
